---

*[include/grpcpp/security/credentials.h, line 224 at r2](https://beta.reviewable.io/reviews/grpc/grpc/14727#-L9LE2CG5NzSa-O0ua7o:-L9LE2CG5NzSa-O0ua7p:b-39luxp) ([raw file](https://github.com/grpc/grpc/blob/377688532be7b8fe3d8f41ea2fdf4ad97d82b570/include/grpcpp/security/credentials.h#L224)):*
> ```objc
> 
> /// Options used to build AltsCredentials.
> struct AltsCredentialsOptions {
> ```

As per our discussion, please move these APIs into an `experimental` namespace (unless @vjpai has an alternative suggestion of how to indicate this), so that we don't commit to them until we're ready to do so.

---

*[include/grpcpp/security/server_credentials.h, line 90 at r2](https://beta.reviewable.io/reviews/grpc/grpc/14727#-L9LEDDT47GLOpo2sRnI:-L9LEDDT47GLOpo2sRnJ:b6nv9kk) ([raw file](https://github.com/grpc/grpc/blob/377688532be7b8fe3d8f41ea2fdf4ad97d82b570/include/grpcpp/security/server_credentials.h#L90)):*
> ```objc
> 
> /// Options to create ServerCredentials with ALTS
> struct AltsServerCredentialsOptions {
> ```

Please move to `experimental` namespace.

---

*[src/core/lib/security/credentials/alts/grpc_alts_credentials_client_options.cc, line 57 at r2](https://beta.reviewable.io/reviews/grpc/grpc/14727#-L9LEgA6D_JK7F6dVk4u:-L9LEgA6D_JK7F6dVk4v:b-ydx7a0) ([raw file](https://github.com/grpc/grpc/blob/377688532be7b8fe3d8f41ea2fdf4ad97d82b570/src/core/lib/security/credentials/alts/grpc_alts_credentials_client_options.cc#L57)):*
> ```cpp
>   }
>   auto client_options =
>       reinterpret_cast<grpc_alts_credentials_client_options*>(options);
> ```

Please use `static_cast` instead of `reinterpret_cast` whenever possible.

---

Review status: all files reviewed at latest revision, 3 unresolved discussions, some commit checks failed. --- *[include/grpcpp/security/credentials.h, line 224 at r2](https://beta.reviewable.io/reviews/grpc/grpc/14727#-L9LE2CG5NzSa-O0ua7o:-L9LgOVF0LLhbNMqsk9D:b-896fix) ([raw file](https://github.com/grpc/grpc/blob/377688532be7b8fe3d8f41ea2fdf4ad97d82b570/include/grpcpp/security/credentials.h#L224)):*
Previously, markdroth (Mark D. Roth) wrote…
As per our discussion, please move these APIs into an `experimental` namespace (unless @vjpai has an alternative suggestion of how to indicate this), so that we don't commit to them until we're ready to do so.
Done. --- *[include/grpcpp/security/server_credentials.h, line 90 at r2](https://beta.reviewable.io/reviews/grpc/grpc/14727#-L9LEDDT47GLOpo2sRnI:-L9LgQlP0Nirg-VBt6t4:b-896fix) ([raw file](https://github.com/grpc/grpc/blob/377688532be7b8fe3d8f41ea2fdf4ad97d82b570/include/grpcpp/security/server_credentials.h#L90)):*

Please move to `experimental` namespace.
Done. --- *[src/core/lib/security/credentials/alts/grpc_alts_credentials_client_options.cc, line 57 at r2](https://beta.reviewable.io/reviews/grpc/grpc/14727#-L9LEgA6D_JK7F6dVk4u:-L9LgVkOEwfIEDxwoAfP:b-svx8q2) ([raw file](https://github.com/grpc/grpc/blob/377688532be7b8fe3d8f41ea2fdf4ad97d82b570/src/core/lib/security/credentials/alts/grpc_alts_credentials_client_options.cc#L57)):*
Previously, markdroth (Mark D. Roth) wrote…
Please use `static_cast` instead of `reinterpret_cast` whenever possible.
Since `options` has a type of `grpc_alts_credentials_options` and `client_options` has a type of `grpc_alts_credentials_client_options`, it does not seem possible to do a safe cast between them. The compiler complains when using `static_cast` . How do you think? --- *Comments from [Reviewable](https://beta.reviewable.io/reviews/grpc/grpc/14727)*

@vjpai

Although ALTS C stack is part of gRPC core, it is still an experimental feature and not ready public consumption yet (need to figure out a plan to whitelist users to use the features). Since there are some tasks (e.g., kokoro tests) that are in need of its C++ wrapper API, we plan to add it to C++ public API headers, but within`experimental` namespace. Regarding its gRFC proposal (https://github.com/grpc/proposal/pull/74), we will still keep it open to get more comments from users, but will not commit it until ALTS is ready for public consumption. How do you think?
Friendly ping @vjpai
The idea of using an experimental namespace sounds good. You can hold off on the gRFC until it's ready to move into the true public API.
All comments are addressed @vjpai

1) MacOS test failure complains about nanopb installing error.
2) Windows test failures seems to be a known issue #14645 @apolcyn  could you please confirm on this?
3) Cloud-to-Cloud tests complain about SSL handshake failures (UNSUPPORTED_PROTOCOL and NO_SHARED_CIPHER). 
4) Cloud-to-Prod tests complain about the failure to build Java interop docker images.

@markdroth , do you know if any of 1), 3) and 4) is a known issue?

For future reference: below is how to restart a single test when you see some build error unrelated to your PR.

1. Click "Details" right to the test.
2. In "INVOCATION DETAILS" tab, click the KOKORO link.
3. Through the link of "Parameters" on the left, you can find the build parameters.
4. Go one level up of the test path (i.e., click the test name, like "grpc_basictests_opt" left to the build number).
5. Click "Build with parameters" on the left, enter the same parameters you find in 3, and click "Build".

You will find the test pending on GitHub PR page.

The Cloud-to-Prod test failure seems unrelated, so I restarted it for you.

> Windows test failures seems to be a known issue #14645 @apolcyn could you please confirm on this?

Yes from the log of the windows test failures, it looks like the test failure is the same as the one from #14645
Both interop tests are currently broken (per discussion with @matt-kwong offline).
